titleStmt.title: Donatio mortis causa
titleStmt.author: Ptolemaios, son of Herakles, son of Nemesion

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "The eighth year of Imperator Caesar Trajanus Hadrianus Augustus, the ninth of the month Neos Sebastos, Hathyr 9, in Tebtunis in the division of Polemon of the Arsinoite nome. Ptolemaios, son of Herakles, son of Nemesion, his mother being Herois, from the aforesaid village of Tebtunis, about thirty-two years old, with a scar on his right knee, acknowledges that he has ceded to his own sons Isidoros and Serapion, mother Agath . . . "

listBibl.bibl: Husselman EM, TAPA 88, 139-40, 1957 -- SB VIII 9642.2 -- BL VII, 213 on line 3,4,5
